title: Difficult Olympic Decisions
description:
Linda and Emily open the show with an update on COVID and not only the NHL regular season but the Olympics as well. After that, they are joined by New York Rangers' Jacob Trouba who comments on COVID, how his season is going, and what he predicts going forward.
